gov.usgs.traveltime

Class ModConvert

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.traveltime.ModConvert

  • public class ModConvert
extends java.lang.Object
    Earth model dependent unit conversions and constants.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double pNorm
      Normalization for slowness and ray parameter.
      double tNorm
      Normalization for travel-time and tau.
      double vNorm
      Normalization for velocity (turns out to be the same as time).
      double xNorm
      Normalization for distance (delta and depth).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModConvert(double rUpperMantle, double rMoho, double rConrad, double rSurface, double vsSurface)
      Set constants from the Java generated model data.
      ModConvert(ReadTau in)
      Set constants from the Fortran generated *.hed file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double flatP(double v, double r)
      Given the normalized velocity and radius, return the normalized slowness.
      double flatZ(double r)
      Given a dimensional radius, return the normalized, Earth flattened depth.
      double realR(double z)
      Given a normalized, Earth flattened depth, return the dimensional radius.
      double realV(double p, double z)
      Given the normalized slowness and depth, return the dimensional velocity at that depth.
      double realZ(double z)
      Given a normalized, Earth flattened depth, return the dimensional depth.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModConvert

        public ModConvert(ReadTau in)
        Set constants from the Fortran generated *.hed file.
        Parameters:
        in - Data from the *.hed and *.tbl files

      • ModConvert

        public ModConvert(double rUpperMantle,
                  double rMoho,
                  double rConrad,
                  double rSurface,
                  double vsSurface)
        Set constants from the Java generated model data.
        Parameters:
        rUpperMantle - Radius of the upper mantle discontinuity in kilometers
        rMoho - Radius of the Moho discontinuity in kilometers
        rConrad - Radius of the Conrad discontinuity in kilometers
        rSurface - Radius of the Earth in kilometers
        vsSurface - Shear velocity in kilometers/second at the surface of the Earth

    • Method Detail

      • realR

        public double realR(double z)
        Given a normalized, Earth flattened depth, return the dimensional radius.
        Parameters:
        z - Normalized, Earth flattened depth
        Returns:
        Radius in kilometers

      • realZ

        public double realZ(double z)
        Given a normalized, Earth flattened depth, return the dimensional depth.
        Parameters:
        z - Normalized, Earth flattened depth
        Returns:
        Depth in kilometers

      • realV

        public double realV(double p,
                    double z)
        Given the normalized slowness and depth, return the dimensional velocity at that depth.
        Parameters:
        p - Normalized slowness
        z - Normalized, Earth flattened depth
        Returns:
        Velocity at that depth in kilometers/second

      • flatZ

        public double flatZ(double r)
        Given a dimensional radius, return the normalized, Earth flattened depth.
        Parameters:
        r - Radius in kilometers
        Returns:
        Normalized, Earth flattened depth

      • flatP

        public double flatP(double v,
                    double r)
        Given the normalized velocity and radius, return the normalized slowness.
        Parameters:
        v - Velocity at radius r in kilometers/second
        r - Radius in kilometers
        Returns:
        Normalized slowness
